name: Padmas On A Koi Pond
description:
"Padmas On A Koi Pond" - 2021

The koi fish in Japanese culture is believed to be a symbol of luck, prosperity, and good fortune, as well as perseverance in the face of adversity.

And while the padma, or lotus flower, has many meanings, it also symbolizes new beginnings, wisdom and fortune.

I hope this image, inspired by my brother's pond, will bring peace, luck and prosperity to you too.
